about_the_game:
Curvelicious

Curvelicious is a fast-paced, action-packed twist on classic curve and snake games, delivering intense multiplayer fun with strategic depth. Gather your friends for local multiplayer matches and enjoy endless excitement with multiple modes, power-ups, and customizable gameplay.

Key Features

Competitive Local Multiplayer Mayhem

Curvelicious supports up to 8 players locally, with adjustable play area sizes to match the number of participants. Whether it's a small, intimate duel or an all-out 8-player brawl, the game scales to fit the action.

Gamepad Support

Play comfortably with gamepad support for up to 8 players, ensuring a smooth and intuitive experience for all.

Three Exciting Game Modes

Arcade Mode: The standard experience, featuring a variety of power-ups that keep the action unpredictable and fun.

Custom Mode: Take control! Adjust everything from curve width, speed, and choose which power-ups are available, letting you craft your own unique gameplay experience.

Classic Mode: Go old school! No power-ups, just pure, skill-based curve mastery.

Dozens of Power-ups

Curvelicious features a wide variety of power-ups that radically change the gameplay.

Use them strategically to gain an edge over your opponents.

Future Singleplayer Mode

We’re planning a dynamic singleplayer experience! Join our Discord Community and help shape the future of the singleplayer mode by sharing your ideas and feedback. Participate in discussions to influence the design of upcoming levels and features!

This feature, if it comes to fruition, will come as an free update.

Currently, Curveliciouns has NO singleplayer mode!

Remote Play Together

Even if you’re not all in the same room, Steam’s Remote Play Together feature allows you to share the local multiplayer experience with your friends online.

Get Ready to Curve

Curvelicious is all about quick reflexes, sharp strategies, and adaptable gameplay. Whether you're playing in Arcade Mode with chaotic power-ups, setting your own rules in Custom Mode, or going back to basics in Classic Mode, every match is a test of wits and skill.

Ready to master the curves and outlast your competition? Gather your friends, set the rules, and dive into the curve-filled chaos today!

short_description: A fast-paced, competitive multiplayer curve game where up to 8 players battle in local matches. Customize your gameplay with dozens of power-ups and game modes, from classic no-powerup duels to chaotic arcade challenges. Master your curve and outlast your opponents! Gamepad supported.
